document_data.name: Firesword
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Firesword''' was a common [[ale]] originally brewed in [[Hillsfar]], [[YÃ»lash]], and [[Zhentil Keep]]. By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the drink spread across the lands on the shores of the [[Moonsea]] and the [[Dragon Reach]].
document_data.Description: Firesword was an amber ale and was more of a type of a drink rather than a named product as it was widely brewed by many establishments, all using similar recipes. Because of that, Firesword one would buy in Hillsfar could taste distinct from Firesword served in [[Ravens Bluff]]. The drink was considered to be an "inn standard" for its longevity and ease of transportation once packaged and sealed in kegs. Many establishments "revived" stale Firesword with [[honey]].
